thread.title: Jimmy Fallon Rips Betsy DeVos With Spoof Twitter Typo Apology
thread.title_full: Jimmy Fallon Rips Betsy DeVos With Spoof Twitter Typo Apology

author: Lee Moran
title: Jimmy Fallon Rips Betsy DeVos With Spoof Twitter Typo Apology
text:
Jimmy Fallon Rips Betsy DeVos With Spoof Twitter Typo Apology "We at the Department of Educashcab..." 02/14/2017 02:50 am ET Jimmy Fallon poked fun at the Department of Education’s embarrassing Twitter typos on Monday. In a spoof clip, “ The Tonight Show ” host coaxed a hilarious apology out of controversial new Education Secretary Betsy DeVos (played by Jo Firestone ). But it didn’t exactly go to plan, as the fake DeVos struggled to read the words on her cue cards. 
Check out the full segment above. Related Coverage
